articles.author: Stephen Farrand
articles.title: 'My first Tour de France, my first stage and what a win!' - Kaden Groves and Mathieu van der Poel celebrate as Alpecin-Deceuninck hit Tour de France jackpot - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Australian sprinter plays key role in split and Jasper Philipsen lead-out
articles.content:
Kaden Groves' Tour de France debut was an emotional day of intense racing culminating in the perfect result for his Alpecin-Deceuninck team.
